title: Ready for the hills
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Outdoor education
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Outdoor recreation - Great Britain
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Outdoor recreation - Safety measures
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Physical education and training
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Survival and emergency equipment
Hobbies, Recreation & Sport/Outdoor recreation - Great Britain
description: A training film on the basic essentials of hillcraft including training beforehand, blisters and the need for boots, type of anorak; windproof or waterproof, keeping together, the correct pace; how to walk, ascent and descent; the need for a leader, contrasts in weather conditions, food for lunch; emergency rations, drinking water and other refreshments, litter, first aid kit, map and compass, staying at youth hostels.
